free_text.Learning outcomes: This course is designed to develop a good understanding of the entrepreneurial process and to acquire the necessary know how to possibly create a start up based upon a technological innovation. [br/]The various dimensions of the business world are addressed and applied on entrepreneurship projects of the participants.[br/]The course is given by lecturers from EPFL and also by lecturers from the industry in collaboration with Venturelab. It includes case analyses and self project deployment.
free_text.Content: [li]Business opportunity[br/][li]Building Strategy[br/][li]New product developments and industrialization[br/][li]Marketing[br/][li]Communication and public relations [br/][li]Sales & Negotiation[br/][li]Accounting & Finance[br/][li]Writing the Business plan[br/][li]Human Resources[br/][li]Intellectual Assets, Legal & Tax[br/][li]Financing[br/][li]Managing a Start-up[br/][li]Final project presentations
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Should have a specific entrepreneurial project in mind[br/]Number of participants limited: Applicants should provide in advance a motivation letter and a brief description of their entrepreneurial project.[br/][br/]For the priority selection round, please send it to venture-challenge@epfl.ch by July 10. For the second selection round, send it by September 1st.

free_text.Contenu: [li]Business opportunity[br/][li]Building Strategy[br/][li]New product developments and industrialization[br/][li]Marketing[br/][li]Communication and public relations [br/][li]Sales & Negotiation[br/][li]Accounting & Finance[br/][li]Writing the Business plan[br/][li]Human Resources[br/][li]Intellectual Assets, Legal & Tax[br/][li]Financing[br/][li]Managing a Start-up[br/][li]Final project presentations
free_text.Prérequis: Should have a specific entrepreneurial project in mind[br/]Number of participants limited: Applicants should provide in advance a motivation letter and a brief description of their entrepreneurial project.[br/][br/]For the priority selection round, please send it to venture-challenge@epfl.ch by July 10. For the second selection round, send it by September 1st.

[br/]The various dimensions of the business world are addressed and applied on entrepreneurship projects of the participants.[br/]The course is given by lecturers from EPFL and also by lecturers from the industry in collaboration with Venturelab.
